Text.Page:
All the rebels still in their right mind have surrendered.

The rest, though..."The rest...?"

Well, the rest have become monsters. They're sick, and they're hurting people.

That's actually why I was glad you showed up. We need help.

Find the {@linkcreature:19#4000#Lokian ragers}, {@linkcreature:19#4003#Lokian gutreavers}, and {@linkcreature:19#4006#Lokian Bloodweavers} near this camp and drive them away.
I don't know what took their minds, but so help me, we'll figure it out.
